hero.subheading: Welcome to our Beta! This is an open-source, not-for-profit project dedicated to helping people learn technical skills with AI tutors and a growing network of human mentors.

pillars.ai_desc: Get instant feedback and personalized guidance from an AI that's always available to help you learn.
pillars.mentor_desc: Connect with experienced mentors for real-world advice and support (coming soon).
pillars.opensource_desc: Built by the community, for the community. Contribute and grow with us on our journey.

features.heading: Why Choose AI Tutor?
features.subheading: Experience personalized learning powered by cutting-edge AI technology

0.title: Intelligent AI Tutor
0.description: Get instant, personalized feedback and guidance from our advanced AI tutor that understands your learning style and adapts to your pace.

1.title: Adaptive Learning Path
1.description: Our AI creates a customized learning journey based on your goals, current skills, and preferred learning methods.

2.title: Community Support
2.description: Join thousands of learners in our supportive community. Share progress, get help, and collaborate on projects.

3.title: Real-world Projects
3.description: Build portfolio-worthy projects with guidance from industry experts and AI-powered code reviews.

4.title: Progress Tracking
4.description: Detailed analytics and progress tracking help you stay motivated and see your growth over time.

5.title: 24/7 Availability
5.description: Learn at your own pace, any time of day. Our AI tutor is always ready to help when you are.

cta.heading: Ready to Start Your Coding Journey?
cta.subheading: Join thousands of learners who are already transforming their careers with our AI-powered learning platform.

footer.company_description: Empowering your coding journey with AI-powered learning. Grow your skills, bloom your potential.
footer.newsletter_description: Get the latest updates on new courses and AI learning tips
